price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), wodeε gyae wͻn kosi sε wͻbehyia wͻn Da no a (ehu ne suro) bεma wͻn atwitwa ahwe ama adeε atͻ wͻn soͻ no.
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī fīhi yuṣ'ʿaqūna
